newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: FORUM SAYS IN TALKS WITH AIR PHILIPPINES.
newsitem.headline: FORUM SAYS IN TALKS WITH AIR PHILIPPINES.

text.p: Forum Pacific Inc said on Thursday it was holding talks with Air Philippines Corp for a possible merger.
"The talk is still ongoing," Forum Pacific president Peter Salud said.
Salud said the plan was first broached up several months ago, but he declined to give any detail regarding the negotiation.
Forum and Air Philippines are both majority owned by businessman William Gatchalian.
Forum, formerly an oil exploration firm, is a newly converted holding company. Air Philippines is one of the newest domestic airlines.
